name: Gatsby Homepage Starters
description:
These Figma files complement Gatsby’s Homepage Starters which demonstrate how to use Contentful, WordPress, Drupal, and DatoCMS to build a homepage and can be customized to match your own visual branding:


  • github.com/gatsbyjs/gatsby-starter-wordpress-homepage / Demo
  • github.com/gatsbyjs/gatsby-starter-contentful-homepage / Demo
  • github.com/gatsbyjs/gatsby-starter-datocms-homepage / Demo
  • github.com/gatsbyjs/gatsby-starter-drupal-homepage / Demo


Gatsby is a fast and flexible JavaScript framework for building and publishing websites with any CMS, API, or database. Learn more at gatsbyjs.com.


Gatsby Starters are boilerplate Gatsby sites maintained officially, or by the community. Find more Gatsby Starters at gatsbyjs.com/starters/.


This Figma file aims to:


  • Enable designers to modify the Homepage Starter design tokens – adjust everything from colors to typography, drop in your logo, etc.
  • Allow the creation of mocks using your own images, and the export of those.
  • Provide a balanced, minimal starting point to either integrate your own design/component system or build upon.
  • Facilitate our own Starter demo site designs and themes.
